isis.stitle: FRONT DRIVE AXLE WHEEL ENDS: FABCO SDA-12 - REASSEMBLY - OUTER DRIVE YOKE AND OUTER DRIVE AXLE SHAFT ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: OUTER DRIVE YOKE AND OUTER DRIVE AXLE SHAFT ASSEMBLY

step1.para: The outer drive yoke should be complete with a bearing race pressed on its hub. This race should not have been removed at disassembly unless either the yoke or race were replaced by new parts.
Lubricate the seal and bearing surface of the outer drive yoke and position the yoke in place in the bearing and seal. Figure 39 illustrates installation of outer drive yoke.
Apply a bead of liquid sealant to the outer axle shaft flange as shown in Figure 43. Refer to GENERAL PRECAUTIONS, Item #1.

Install the yoke spacer ring onto the outer axle shaft splines. Insert the shaft into the spindle bore, rotate and align the splines with the drive yoke splines. Rotate the shaft and yoke to align the flange holes with the drive studs as shown in Figure 40.
Insert the long (2 inch) yoke retaining bolt through a new sealing washer, through the retaining washer and into the threaded hole in the shaft end ( Figure 5). Tighten to 125 ft-lbs. (170 N·m).
Push axially on the outer drive yoke and check for positive clearance under the axle shaft flange. The clearance should be at least .015 inch ( Figure 41).

figure.caption: Figure 42. Checking Axle Shaft Flange Clearance

step1.para: Install the locknuts to retain the axle shaft. Tighten to 125 ft-lbs. (170 N·m).
On oil lubricated wheel bearings, turn wheel hub to position the oil plug hole in the outer axle shaft horizontally (refer to Figure 42). Fill hub with specified oil and install plug.
